channel.title: [Neutral Killer] The Depender
channel.description:
[quote] (Female :D) <big>**[color=B8B6B6]The Depender[/color]**</big> [color=B8B6B6]**Neutral Killer**[/color]
**Sister's Rival (Passive)** - This class cannot spawn with **[color=B8B6B6]Pretender[/color]** and vise versa. Also have Royal Blood!
**I accidentally killed your friend (Passive)** - Her first kill faction will choose which faction will she along with. Also death immune and bleed immune!
- **[color=2A7AFC]Blue Dragon[/color]** - The faction choose will be annouced and she will lose bleed immune and death immune. - **[color=EE1212]Cult[/color]** - Cult will permanently lose a convert slot and [color=B8B6B6]**Depender**[/color] will know other **[color=EE1212]Cult[/color]**'s but unable to talk with them. - **[color=8012D6]Unseen[/color]** - Join the **[color=8012D6]Unseen[/color]** and filling the **[color=8012D6]Assassin[/color]** slot. Death immune will only work once. The **[color=8012D6]Assassin[/color]** will die in the place of the **[color=8012D6]Converted Unseen[/color]**. - **[color=B8B6B6]Neutral[/color]** - She will play as normal **[color=B8B6B6]Neutral Killer[/color]**
**Flirty (Day)** - You will know all the factions visited your target tonight. [2 Use]
**Just a killing action (Night)** - Kill your target. Reduce to 2 Uses as choosing **[color=2A7AFC]Blue Dragon[/color]**. [Infinite Use]
**An End to a Start (Night)** - Heal a target while killing everyone visiting them. [1 Use]
**Win condition:** *You have the same win condition as the faction you chose. You will have **[color=B8B6B6]Neutral Killer[/color]** win condition if you didnt kill that round.* [/quote]

Alright, everything seem fine so far!
Also the unable to talk with other Cults include unable to see their actions

item.title: [Neutral Killer] The Depender
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
1. Removed Hail to the King
  2. Adjusted BD from losing bleed immune and death immune work once to lose both immune
  3. Reduce Killing action after choosing BD from 3 use to 2 use
  4. Added Unseen interaction which make Assassin become their previous converted class if available.

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral Killer] The Depender
item.dc:creator: MathBlade
item.description:
Town doesn’t get death immune like almost if ever. Or bleed immune unless physician. There has to be a mechanical reason.

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral Killer] The Depender
item.dc:creator: MathBlade
item.description:
I did read. That is too OP.

Depender kills BD n1
Uses Hail the King D2
N2 gets confirmed kills a player on King advice
D3 King announces confirm
N3 kills again
—-D4 first time that they can be killed.
So N4 use last kill

That is a ton of kill power. It’s too much that scum can’t defend against

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral Killer] The Depender
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
I will sure remove Hail to the King but im still thinking of the passive interaction

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral Killer] The Depender
item.dc:creator: MathBlade
item.description:
So not only does the Depender kill an Unseen they could lose another due to suicide?

That’s pretty shitty.

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral Killer] The Depender
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
You didnt read did you?
She will lose bleed immune and death immune only work once if become BD

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral Killer] The Depender
item.dc:creator: MathBlade
item.description:
A death immune bleed immune townie with 3 kills is beyond OP. Prince is supposed to be the most OP role in the game and doesn’t have bleed/kill immune for that reason.

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral Killer] The Depender
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
Well they will suidice
Or Assassin will become their previous converted class if that slot is available

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral Killer] The Depender
item.dc:creator: MathBlade
item.description:
Hail to the king is bad idea for a few reasons:

  1. Meta will require The Depender to use it. Then King will have to “confirm” defender or be outed as evil King. This will give town at least one if not more confirmed kills. This makes it more OP than Prince.

  2. Hail to the king has no relation to the other abilities and seems only to exist to confirm the depender.

  3. Other BD classes have a penalty for killing BD (except Hunter) which is delayed bleed.

  4. Stealing and taking people in and out of roles /alignments is a mess. What happens to those people? Eg what happens to current assassin?

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral Killer] The Depender
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
(Female :D)
The Depender
Neutral Killer

Sister’s Rival (Passive) - This class cannot spawn with Pretender and vise versa. Also have Royal Blood!

I accidentally killed your friend (Passive) - Her first kill faction will choose which faction will she along with. Also death immune and bleed immune!

  • Blue Dragon - The faction choose will be annouced and she will lose bleed immune and death immune.
  • Cult - Cult will permanently lose a convert slot and Depender will know other Cult’s but unable to talk with them.
  • Unseen - Join the Unseen and filling the Assassin slot. Death immune will only work once. The Assassin will die in the place of the Converted Unseen.
  • Neutral - She will play as normal Neutral Killer

Flirty (Day) - You will know all the factions visited your target tonight. [2 Use]

Just a killing action (Night) - Kill your target. Reduce to 2 Uses as choosing Blue Dragon. [Infinite Use]

An End to a Start (Night) - Heal a target while killing everyone visiting them. [1 Use]

Win condition:
You have the same win condition as the faction you chose. You will have Neutral Killer win condition if you didnt kill that round.

Read full topic
